AT_HUGS.caption: Hug
AT_HUGS.explanation: 50%: stick [prevented by oilskin cloak or greased outermost body armor (cloak, body armor or shirt)]

AT_ENGL.caption: Engulf
AT_ENGL.explanation: You are inside a monster, can't move and always hit

AT_GAZE.caption: Gaze
AT_GAZE.explanation: Acitvates when you see a monster [prevented by blindness]

AT_TENT.caption: Suck
AT_TENT.explanation: Prevented by helmet 87.5%, by greased helmet 100%, but 50% wear off

AT_WEAP.caption: Weapon
AT_WEAP.explanation: Damage from weapon is added to standard damage

AT_NONE.caption: Passive
AT_NONE.explanation: Activates when you try to hit a monster in melee

AD_ACID.caption: Acid
AD_ACID.explanation:
1. If you kick and hit, then 16.7%: corrode boots for one grade. If you 
strike and hit, then 16.7%: corrode weapon for one grade. 
2. Damage->XdY if X!=0 and Lv d Y, if X=0. If you hit, 50%: acid damage for Damage Hp. Then 3.3% of corrode armor for one grade. How item is selected:
1. Choose helmet, body  (most outer: cloak, body armor, shirt), shield, gloves and boots (20% each)
2. If body is selected, then stop regardless of item material.
3. Test, if item can be eroded.
4. If item can't be eroded, go to 1.

AD_PLYS.caption: Paralyze
AD_PLYS.explanation: 66.7%: Damage->XdY if X!=0 and Lv d Y, if X=0. Even if you missed, set paralyze timer: if Wi>12 then Damage turns; if Wi<=12 then 75%: Damage turns; 25%: 127 turns. Then Damage->0. If you hit blind floating eye, 0.2%: lose 1 Luck. Resistance item: ring of free action

AD_STON.caption: Petrify
AD_STON.explanation:
Instant petrify if you land a successful hit, but have incorrect protector. Protectors are:
Kick: boots
Strike with weapon: weapon
Strike with bare hands: gloves
Damage->0

AD_COLD.caption: Cold
AD_COLD.explanation: 66.7%: Damage->XdY if X!=0 and Lv d Y, if X=0. Even if you missed, do cold damage. Also, monster heals for Damage/2 Hp and can even split if healed enough.

AD_ELEC.caption: Shock
AD_ELEC.explanation: 66.7%: Damage->XdY if X!=0 and Lv d Y, if X=0. Even if you missed, do shock damage for Damage Hp.

AD_FIRE.caption: Fire
AD_FIRE.explanation:
1. If you kick and hit, then 16.7%: burn boots for one grade. If you strike and hit, then 16.7%: burn weapon for one grade. Note: fire vortex don't erode objects.
2. 66.7%: Damage->XdY if X!=0 and Lv d Y, if X=0. Even if you missed, do fire damage for Damage Hp.

AD_STUN.caption: Stun
AD_STUN.explanation: 66.7%: Damage->XdY if X!=0 and Lv d Y, if X=0. Even if you missed, but only if you are not already stunned, set stun timer to Damage turns. Then, Damage->0

AD_CORR.caption: Corrode
AD_CORR.explanation:
If you kick and hit, then 100%: corrode boots for one grade. If you 
strike and hit, then 100%: corrode weapon for one grade. Damage->0

AD_RUST.caption: Rust
AD_RUST.explanation:
If you kick and hit, then 100%: rust boots for one grade. If you 
strike and hit, then 100%: rust weapon for one grade. Damage->0

AD_ENCH.caption: Disenchant
AD_ENCH.explanation:
If you kick and hit, then 100%: if positively enchanted, boots lose 1 enchantment. If you 
strike and hit, then 100%: if positively enchanted, weapon lose 1 enchantment. Damage->0

AD_MAGM.caption: M. Missile
AD_MAGM.explanation: Damage->XdY if X!=0 and Lv d Y, if X=0. Even if you miss, do magic missile damage for Damage Hp

AD_FIRE.caption: Fire
AD_FIRE.explanation:
20%: nothing; 80%: Damage->2d6 (fire). Burn away slime; If Lv>=d20, destroy Damage/5 items without additional 
damage: Potions, Scrolls, Spellbooks, Green slime globs. Separate roll: if Lv>=d20, burn one (organic) item for one grade. How item is selected:
1. Choose helmet, body  (most outer: cloak, body armor, shirt), shield, gloves and boots (20% each)
2. If body is selected, then stop regardless of item material.
3. Test, if item can be eroded.
4. If item can't be eroded, go to 1.

AD_BLND.caption: Blind
AD_BLND.explanation: Set blindness timer to Damage turns. Also, set stunned timer to d3 turns if current timer is lesser. Then, Damage->0. Resistance item: worn blindfold

AD_CONF.caption: Conf
AD_CONF.explanation: 20%: nothing; 80%: Increase confused timer by 3d4 turns. Damage->0

AD_STON.caption: Petrify
AD_STON.explanation: Instant petrification. Damage->0. Resistance item: aside from rare stoning resistace, you can protect yourself with blindfold or some reflecting item.

AD_STUN.caption: Stun
AD_STUN.explanation: 20%: nothing; 80%: Increase stunned timer by 2d6 turns. Then, Damage->0

AD_COLD.caption: Cold
AD_COLD.explanation: Ray Damage->Xd6. 33.3%: destroy Damage/5 items with no additional damage: Potions

AD_FIRE.caption: Fire
AD_FIRE.explanation:
Ray Damage->Xd6. Burn away slime. Burn one (organic) item for one grade. How item is selected:
1. Choose helmet, body  (most outer: cloak, body armor, shirt), shield, gloves and boots (20% each)
2. If body is selected, then stop regardless of item material.
3. Test, if item can be eroded.
4. If item can't be eroded, go to 1.
If selected item is body item (most outer: cloak, body armor, shirt), then 33.3%: destroy Damage/5 items with no additional damage: Potions, Scrolls, Spellbooks, Green slime globs

AD_SLEE.caption: Sleep
AD_SLEE.explanation: Set sleep timer to Xd25 turns. Damage->0

AD_DISN.caption: Disint.
AD_DISN.explanation:
1. If you have a shield, then destroy it, but you stay alive
2. Else, destroy body armor and cloak, but you stay alive
3. Else, you die.
Please note that if you are resistant, you will not die, but this will not protect your items. In all cases Damage->0

AD_ELEC.caption: Shock
AD_ELEC.explanation:
Ray Damage->Xd6. 33.3%: destroy Damage/5 items with no additional damage: destroy Damage/5 items with no additional damage: Wands, metallic 
rings (if ring can be charged, 66.7% chance of charging it instead of destroying)

AD_DRST.caption: Poison -St
AD_DRST.explanation:
Poison with no additinal damage: (a) 6.7% of 6+4d6 damage, if still alive, then reduce max HP for 50% of damage 
received, -1 Co, -3 Dx. (b) 60.0% of 5+d10 additional damage (c) 33.3% of -1 Dx.

AD_ACID.caption: Acid
AD_ACID.explanation:
Damage->Xd6. If twoweapon, then 33.3% separate chance of corrode every weapon. If one weapon, then 16.7%: corrode weapon.
Separate 16.7% chance  of corrode one (metallic) item for one grade. How item is selected:
1. Choose helmet, body  (most outer: cloak, body armor, shirt), shield, gloves and boots (20% each)
2. If body is selected, then stop regardless of item material.
3. Test, if item can be eroded.
4. If item can't be eroded, go to 1.

AD_RBRE.caption: Random
AD_RBRE.explanation: Types: magic missile , fire, cold, sleep, disintegration, lightning, poison clouds (non-reflectible), acid

AD_PHYS.explanation: Ordinary physical. Damage->XdY if X!=0 and Lv d Y, if X=0

AD_COLD.caption: Cold
AD_COLD.explanation: Damage->XdY if X!=0 and Lv d Y, if X=0. Destroy Damage/5 items with no additional damage: Potions. Also destroy items on the floor.

AD_FIRE.caption: Fire
AD_FIRE.explanation:
Burn away slime. Damage->XdY if X!=0 and Lv d Y, if X=0. Destroy Damage/5 items with no additional damage: Potions, Scrolls, Spellbooks, Green slime globs. Also destroy items on the floor. Burn one (organic) item for one grade. How item is selected:
1. Choose helmet, body  (most outer: cloak, body armor, shirt), shield, gloves and boots (20% each)
2. If body is selected, then stop regardless of item material.
3. Test, if item can be eroded.
4. If item can't be eroded, go to 1.

AD_ELEC.caption: Shock
AD_ELEC.explanation: Damage->XdY if X!=0 and Lv d Y, if X=0. Destroy Damage/5 items with no  additional damage: Wands, metallic rings (if ring can be charged, 66.7% chance of charging it instead of destroying)

AD_BLND.caption: Blind
AD_BLND.explanation: Set blindness timer to Damage turns, then Damage->0. If you didn't see the monster, then set timer to d(Damage/2). Resistance item: worn blindfold

AD_HALU.caption: Hallu
AD_HALU.explanation: Increase hallucination timer by Damage turns, then Damage->0

AD_FIRE.caption: Fire
AD_FIRE.explanation: Burn away slime; If Lv>=d20, destroy Damage/5 items with additional damage: Potions (d6), Scrolls (1), Spellbooks (1), Green slime globs ((Wt+19)/20)

AD_COLD.caption: Cold
AD_COLD.explanation:
If Lv>=d20, destroy Damage/5 items with 
additional damage: Potions (d4)

AD_SLEE.caption: Sleep
AD_SLEE.explanation: 80%: ordinary damage; 20%: ordinary damage, then, if not helpless, sleep counter set to d10 turns

AD_ELEC.caption: Shock
AD_ELEC.explanation: If Lv>=d20, destroy Damage/5 items with additional damage: Wands(d10), metallic rings (0 damage, if ring can be charged, 66.7% chance of charging it instead of destroying)

AD_DRST.caption: Poison -St
AD_DRST.explanation: 87.5%: ordinary damage; 12.5%: ordinary damage, then poison: (a) 3.3% of 6+4d6 damage, if still alive, then reduce max HP for 50% of damage received, -1 Co, -3 St. (b) 80% of 5+d10 additional damage (c) 16.7% of -1 St.

AD_BLND.caption: Blind
AD_BLND.explanation: Set blindness timer to Damage turns, then Damage->0. Resistance item: worn blindfold

AD_STUN.caption: Stun
AD_STUN.explanation: 75%: ordinary damage; 25%: increase stun timer for Damage turns, but Damage->Damage/2

AD_SLOW.caption: Slow
AD_SLOW.explanation: 75%: ordinary damage; 25%: ordinary damage, then lose intrinsic speed

AD_PLYS.caption: Paralyze
AD_PLYS.explanation: If not helpless, set paralyzed timer to d10 turns. Resistance item: ring of free action

AD_DRLI.caption: Drain life
AD_DRLI.explanation: 66.7%: ordinary damage; 33.3%: ordinary damage, then lose 1 experience level

AD_DREN.caption: Drain Pw
AD_DREN.explanation: 75%: nothing; 25%: Pw->Pw-Damage, if Pw becomes negative, then MAX Pw->MAX Pw-d(Pw-Damage). In all cases Damage->0

AD_LEGS.caption: Legs
AD_LEGS.explanation: If levitating, flying or riding: nothing; if iron shoes or low boots: 60%: ordinary damage; 40%: nothing; other cases: ordinary damage, then set wounded legs timeout for d(60-Dx) turns, but if current timeout is already greater, then just ordinary damage

AD_STON.caption: Petrify
AD_STON.explanation: 66.7% (at new moon) or 96.7% (other moon phases): ordinary damage; 33.3% (at new moon) or 3.3% (other moon phases): ordingary damage, then lose intrinsic speed, then begin 5-turns petrification process, but you can act only for first two turns

AD_STCK.caption: Sticky
AD_STCK.explanation: Monster sticks to you. After that you can't move, and lose one turn for each moving try.

AD_SGLD.caption: Steal gold
AD_SGLD.explanation: If gold on the floor is greater than gold in open inventory, steal it completely; else steal 10%...100% of your gold, uniformely distributed. Then monster teleports away if he can, or flee if he can't

AD_SITM.caption: Steal
AD_SITM.explanation: Nymphs: if you are punished, 75% that chain is removed. Else, if your have adorement rings without gloves, steal one. Else, steal one object, uncovered by others, then nymph teleports. Animals: Steal one object, uncovered by others, then monster flees.

AD_SEDU.caption: Steal
AD_SEDU.explanation:
Nymphs: if you are punished, 75% that chain is removed. Else, if your 
have adorement rings without gloves, steal one. Else, steal one object, 
uncovered by others, then nymph teleports. Animals: Steal one object, 
uncovered by others, then monster flees.

AD_TLPT.caption: Teleport
AD_TLPT.explanation: Teleport to safe location, guaranteed not fatal (set to 1 hp if damage was too big). If you have teleport control and not stunned, you can select new location

AD_RUST.caption: Rust
AD_RUST.explanation:
Rust one (metallic) item for one grade. How item is selected:
1. Choose helmet, body  (most outer: cloak, body armor, shirt), shield, gloves and boots (20% each)
2. If body is selected, then stop regardless of item material.
3. Test, if item can be eroded.
4. If item can't be eroded, go to 1.

AD_CONF.caption: Conf
AD_CONF.explanation: 75%: nothing; 25%: set confusion timer to Damage turns, then Damage->0

AD_HEAL.caption: Heal
AD_HEAL.explanation: If armed or not naked: ordinary damage. If naked and unarmed, Damage->0, cure sickness, Hp->Hp+d7, 14.2% of MAX Hp->MAX Hp+1 (if MAX Hp<5*xlvl+(2*xlvl)d10), then 7.7% of flee.

AD_WRAP.caption: Drowning
AD_WRAP.explanation: If you are not stuck: 10% of ordinary damage, then stick; 90% of nothing. If you are stuck, and monster is on the water, and you can't breath in water, then ordinary damage, then drown. Other cases: ordinary damage. Resistance item: initial stuck can be prevented by oilskin cloak or greased outermost body armor (cloak, body armor, shirt), but if you are already stuck, this will not help.

AD_WERE.caption: Lycantropy
AD_WERE.explanation: 75%: ordinary damage; 25%: ordinary damage, then catch lycantropy. Resistance item: ring of protection from shape changers

AD_DRDX.caption: Poison -Dx
AD_DRDX.explanation:
87.5%: ordinary damage; 12.5%: ordinary damage, then poison: (a) 3.3% of 6+4d6 damage, if still alive, then reduce max HP for 50% of damage received, -1 Co, -3 Dx. (b) 80% of 5+d10 additional damage (c) 16.7% of 
-1 Dx.

AD_DRCO.caption: Poison -Co
AD_DRCO.explanation: 87.5%: ordinary damage; 12.5%: ordinary damage, then poison: (a) 3.3% of 6+4d6 damage, if still alive, then reduce max HP for 50% of damage received, -3 Co. (b) 80% of 5+d10 additional damage (c) 16.7% of -1 Co.

AD_DRIN.caption: -In
AD_DRIN.explanation: -d2 In (In<3: death), then 20%: forget any number of spells (from 1 to all); 20% independent chance: forget d2 learned skills for one grade. If spells of skills was forgotten, then skip further drain attacks for this turn

AD_DISE.caption: Disease
AD_DISE.explanation: Set Ill timer to 20+d(Co) turns. If already ill, then timer->timer/3+1

AD_DCAY.caption: Decay organics
AD_DCAY.explanation:
Rot one (organic) item for one grade. How item is selected:
1. Choose helmet, body  (most outer: cloak, body armor, shirt), shield, gloves and boots (20% each)
2. If body is selected, then stop regardless of item material.
3. Test, if item can be eroded.
4. If item can't be eroded, go to 1.

AD_SSEX.caption: Seduce
AD_SSEX.explanation: 1. Demon disrobes you. For every armor item you will be asked if d20-1<Ch. If cloak and body armor absent, then 2. Sex occurs: if d35-1>min(32, Ch+Wi) then you get one of negative effects: -Pw, -Wi, -Co, -xlvl or -(6+d10) hp. Else you get one of positive effects: +Pw and MAX Pw, +Co, +Wi, +xlvl or + hp.

AD_DETH.caption: Deadly touch
AD_DETH.explanation:
25%: nothing; 60%: MAX Hp reduced:
MAX Hp>25*xlvl:MAX Hp->MAX Hp-Damage
MAX Hp>10*xlvl:MAX Hp->MAX Hp-(d(Damage/2)+Damage/2)
MAX Hp>5*xlvl:MAX Hp->MAX Hp-(d(Damage/2)+Damage/4)
MAX Hp<=5*xlvl:MAX Hp->MAX Hp-d(Damage/2);
15%: if magic resistant, MAX Hp reduced as described above, else "Touch of death" occurs: Damage->50+8d6. If  Damage/2>MAX Hp, then you die. Else, Hp->Hp-Damage, MAX Hp->MAX Hp-Damage/2

AD_PEST.caption: Plus disease
AD_PEST.explanation: Set Ill timer to 20+d(Co) turns. If already ill, then timer->timer/3+1

AD_FAMN.caption: Plus hunger
AD_FAMN.explanation: If you are not fainted, lose 40+d40 nutrition

AD_SLIM.caption: Slime
AD_SLIM.explanation: Set sliming timer to 10 turns. Resistance item: amulet of unchanging

AD_ENCH.caption: Disenchant
AD_ENCH.explanation: 1. Select random armor (for body, only outermost slot is used: cloak, body armor, shirt), 2. If positively enchanted, drain selected item for 1 point with 90% chance (or 10% chance for artifacts). If player is naked, drain one of worn chargeble, positively enchanted rings for 1 point (20% for each)

AD_CORR.caption: Corrode
AD_CORR.explanation:
Corrode one (metallic) item for one grade. How item is selected:
1. Choose helmet, body  (most outer: cloak, body armor, shirt), shield, gloves and boots (20% each)
2. If body is selected, then stop regardless of item material.
3. Test, if item can be eroded.
4. If item can't be eroded, go to 1.

AD_SAMU.caption: -Artifact
AD_SAMU.explanation: 95%: ordinary damage; 5%: ordinary damage, then steal one quest artifact of any role. If you have no quest artifacts, then steal one item: invocation items, Amulet of Yendor, fake Amulet of Yendor, ordinary bell. Wizard of Yendor don't steal fake Amulet and ordinary bell. Then monster teleports away.

AD_CURS.caption: -Intrinsic
AD_CURS.explanation: 90%: ordinary damage; 10%: ordinary damage, then lose random instrinsic and give it to monster (fire, cold, poison, telepathy, teleportitis, invisiblity, see invisible, speed, stealth, aggravate monsters, intrinsic protection). Gremlins can steal only at night (22:00...05:00 server time)

AD_POLY.caption: Polymorph
AD_POLY.explanation: If you have lycantropy, polymorph to your secon form. Else, polymorph to random monster. Resistanse item: amulet of unchanging

AD_WRAP.caption: Wrap
AD_WRAP.explanation: No effect except engulfing itself (sic!) and no damage.

AD_BLND.caption: Blind
AD_BLND.explanation: Set blindness timeout to Damage turns. Then, Damage->0. Resistace item: worn blindfold.

AD_COLD.caption: Cold
AD_COLD.explanation: 50%: nothing; 50%: cold damage for Damage points

AD_ELEC.caption: Shock
AD_ELEC.explanation: 50%: nothing; 50%: shock damage for Damage points

AD_DREN.caption: Drain Pw
AD_DREN.explanation: 25%: nothing; 75%: Pw->Pw-Damage, if Pw becomes negative, then MAX Pw->MAX Pw-d(Pw-Damage). In all cases Damage->0

AD_FIRE.caption: Fire
AD_FIRE.explanation: 50%: nothing; 50%: Burn away slime. Fire damage for Damage points

AD_DGST.caption: Digest
AD_DGST.explanation: Set digestion timer to [10-AC+Co/3+d(25-Lv)/2-1] attacks. Please note that counter decreases with every attack, not with every turn. When counter reaches zero, you die. When you get expelled, timer resets. Resistance item: ring of slow digestion

AD_DISE.caption: Disease
AD_DISE.explanation: Set Ill timer to 20+d(Co) turns. If already ill, then timer->timer/3+1

AD_SPEL.caption: Mage
AD_SPEL.explanation: Psi bolt (Lvl>=1, D), Cure self (2, U), Haste self (3, U), Stun (4, D), Disappear (5, U), Drain strength (7, D), Destroy armor (9, D), Curse items (11, D), Aggravate (14, U), Summon nasties (16, U), Touch of death (21, D), Double Trouble (19, only for Wizard of Yendor)

AD_MAGM.caption: M. Missile
AD_MAGM.explanation:
Magic missiles damage.
Ranged: Damage->XdY
Melee: Damage->(Lv/2+1)d6

AD_CLRC.caption: Clerical
AD_CLRC.explanation: Open wounds (Lvl>=1, D), Cure self (2, U), Confuse (3, D), Paralyze (5, D), Blind (6, D), Summon insects (9, U), Curse items (10, D), Lightning (12, D), Fire pillar (13, D), Geyser (14, D)

AD_COLD.caption: Cold
AD_COLD.explanation:
Cold damage.
Ranged: Damage->XdY. Also, destroy Damage/5 items with no additional damage: Potions
Melee: Damage->(Lv/2+X)dY

AD_DRST.caption: Poison -St
AD_DRST.explanation: Despite its name, this attack creates a blinding venom. Blinding venom: increase blindness timer by d25 turns. Resistance item: worn blindfold

AD_BLND.caption: Blind
AD_BLND.explanation: Blinding venom: increase blindness timer by d25 turns. Resistance item: worn blindfold
